summary: This is the tale of Albert Poop-Decker, a newly commissioned Midshipman (although he took 8 1/2 years to qualify). He joins the frigate Venus, and adventures through Spanish waters, mutinee... See full summary Â»
cast: Kenneth Williams|Bernard Cribbins|Juliet Mills|Charles Hawtrey|Donald Houston|Percy Herbert|Jim Dale|Patrick Cargill|Cecil Parker|Ed Devereaux|Peter Gilmore|George Woodbridge|Ian Wilson|Jimmy Thompson|Anton Rodgers|Michael Nightingale|Frank Forsyth|Barrie Gosney|John Brooking|Jan Muzurus|Viviane Ventura|Marianne Stone|Chris Adcock|Tony Allen|Bernard Barnsley|Joe Beckett|Ted Bushell|Marian Collins|Kenneth Cope|Maxwell Craig|Dominique Don|Sally Douglas|Pat Gorman|Josie Grant|Jean Hamilton|Frank Harper|Walter Henry|Bill Hibbert|Jennifer Hill|George Hilsdon|Pat Judge|Max Latimer|Aileen Lewis|Martin Lyder|Fred Machon|Rosemary Manley|Lou Morgan|Jim O'Brady|Neil Osborne|Charles Price|Reg Prince|Ernie Rice|Guy Standeven|Dorinda Stevens|Bill Strange|Reg Thomason|John Tordoff|Del Watson
title: Los tremendos piratas del Venus
